pages.title: Beginner Modifiers
pages.text: Your first vaults will all have $(#033dfc)Peaceful$(), which makes mobs no longer spawn naturally, $(#033dfc)Beginner's Insurance$(), which marks all chests as safe and $(#033dfc)Beginner's Grace$(), which spawns you with all the items you died with, with Beginners Insurance leaving at $(#033dfc)LVL10+$(), then later both Beginner's Grace and Peaceful disappearing at $(#033dfc)LVL25+$().

pages.title: Easier Starting
pages.text: All these modifiers are intended to $(#033dfc)assist$() you to ease into the $(#033dfc)difficulty of the Vaults$() and to gear up before the Vaults $(#033dfc)scale$() further in difficulty.
